reviews.review: The best game ever :) يا لبييه

Personally my favorite game ever. Has a very high skill ceiling and very rigorous and sort of fun competitive atmosphere that I enjoy. If you want to just pop some domes and release anger this is the game for you. 10/10 would recommend.
